alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 27 at 1:44PM PDT until October 29 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PDT SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected in southern Oregon and as low as 20 in Siskiyou County. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 in southern Oregon and as low as 18 in Siskiyou County possible. * WHERE...In California, Western Siskiyou County and Central Siskiyou County, including Yreka, Happy Camp and Gazelle. In Oregon, Eastern Curry County, Central Douglas County, Josephine County and Jackson County. This includes the Scott, Rogue, Klamath River, Shasta, Umpqua and Illinois valleys. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 9 AM PDT Saturday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locations in far northwest Douglas County, including Scottsburg, are more likely to remain with 33 to 35 degrees. Temperatures in far western Siskiyou County, including Somes Bar, have less than a 10% probability to reach 32 degrees or colder. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Jackson County
